bio: Hey! I'm Bishwa Thakur, a software developer passionate about building mobile and full-stack applications.
I specialize in Kotlin, Flutter, and React Native, focusing on clean architecture, performance, and scalability.
I love solving meaningful problems and crafting user-friendly experiences that make a real difference.
personalBio: I'm currently studying Civil Engineering at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad, but you'll mostly find me deep in code unless its a Race Weekend.
I'm part of CyberLabs and other tech clubs here — it’s where I get to collaborate, build, break things, and learn from the chaos.
Outside of all the tech stuff, I make short films with Lights Camera ISM, hit the gym regularly (lifting keeps me sane), and never go an hour without music.
Oh, and I’m a proper Formula 1 nerd — Sundays are for racing, not debugging.
I like mixing structure with creativity, which is probably why I enjoy both programming and storytelling. It helps me look at problems from more than one angle.
